title: "UNESCO's Women4Ethical AI urges global cooperation for gender-inclusive AI"
excerpt: "Established by UNESCO, the Women4Ethical AI Platform was launched during CSW63 to foster the integration of gender equality into the development and deployment of AI technologies, thus contributing to the global conversation on the role that women can and should play in shaping AI."
